quote: Satisfaction of Client Worth more than Money!
tagline: I Can Design Anything You Want
about: Hi There. I'm an expert graphic designer ready to bring your vision to life. From logos to websites, I offer professional and high-quality design services for all your needs. Trust me to elevate your brand and take it to the next level.

process.name: Happy Clients
process.description: When working with clients. Money is not my main objective. I strive to make all clients Happy. It's on fiverr or Local.

process.name: Projects Completed
process.description: I have completed more than 250+ Projects. Every single project have taught me something new.

process.name: Years of Success
process.description: It's been 6 Successful Years in Graphic Designing field.

experiences.description:
Working as a freelancer in Asp.net, Angular, Angular Dart, and WordPress. Till now, I have worked on some of the projects listed below: 

 • My Life You Choose (Asp.Net MVC) 
 • AM-Brisbane-Psychology (Asp.Net Razor Pages) 
 • Ease My Sales (Angular) 
 • Pagric Web Application (Angular) 
 • Tipnet (Angular) 
 • Tamino Autograph (WordPress) 
 • Roofers Free Zone Co (WordPress)

I am a seasonal web developer in Asp.Net, and Angular for close to two years. I have experience in building both front-end and back-end web applications using these technologies. During my time at perspective-v, I gained hands-on experience with Ag-Grid, Nx-Workspaces, Angular DataTables, Syncfusion, and more. I have worked on variety of projects, Including: 

 • Learn Quran Live Academy (Asp.Net 6)
 • Flat Management System (Angular)
 • Gorsi Shop (Asp.Net Core 3.1)
 • Client Management Website (Angular + Asp.Net)

In my time at Gorsi Shop, I have created their E-Commerce website in Wordpress as well as in Asp.Net Core MVC, named Gorsi Shop. Once in Asp.net Core and the second iteration in WordPress. 
 Gorsi Shop is an e-commerce website that allows whole sellers to buy any IT related items such as keyboards, mouse, printers, projectors etc. And a complete admin panel is implemented for the admins of the site to manage products, orders and view reviews on different projects. 

 Tools: 
1st Iteration: 
• Front-end: Html, Css, jQuery 
• Back-end: Asp.Net Core 2.0, Entity Framework Core 

 2nd Iteration: 
• WordPress

services.description: Branding identity is the documentation of a brand's unique perception and covers all the aspects that make you stand out from other businesses.

services.name: Web Design
services.description: Your printed marketing material can make a significant impact on your company's image. We provide quality print design services to make sure that your business is Standing out from others.

testimonials.name: rotimilademo
testimonials.review: I recently had the pleasure of working with this incredible designer on Fiverr. They were not only exceptionally talented, but also incredibly responsive throughout the entire process. Their attention to detail and ability to understand my vision exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend their services to anyone seeking a top-notch designer.

testimonials.name: pastorjoseph
testimonials.review: Wow! Wow! Wow! I am so glad that I found casadkhan. What a top-notch designer and person to work with. He was fast, responsive, and patient with me as we went through several revisions. I could trust him to read my artistic direction and make something beautiful. The original project was 4 pages and the final project ended up to be 7 pages. But the final product was amazing!

testimonials.review: good work and did what I asked

testimonials.name: keangelomaybury
testimonials.review: Loved the template design, documentation, customizability and the customer support from Marketify team! I am a noob in programming with very little knowledge about coding but the Marketify team helped me to launch my resume website successfully. Much recommended!

testimonials.name: scaryspikes
testimonials.review: It was quite easy working with this seller. I think at first we had a couple misunderstandings, but after communicating a little, the seller was quite good at responding to the changes I needed to have made, and they did a great job working very quickly with a demanding client. Much appreciate the help and would definitely recommend to others.
